summary:
The Black Eyed Peas are an American music group from Los Angeles, known for their catchy pop-rap songs. They formed in 1995 and gained popularity in the 2000s with hits like "Where Is the Love?" and "Boom Boom Pow." The group has sold over 80 million records worldwide and won three Grammy Awards. 

Original members will.i.am, apl.de.ap, and Taboo were joined by Fergie in 2002. They took a break in 2011 but reunited with a new member, J. Rey Soul, in 2018. They continue to make music, exploring new sounds like reggaeton.
title: Black Eyed Peas
